column4: ok, wow, I had a raid array and I am not sure if I set it up properly, but I noticed in the root home directory I have a new  vmlinuz.old and initrd.img.old
nope didnt do anything.  Yes, ubuntu server

If SDB is dead and you need to recover data I would highly suggest spending 89 bucks for Steve Gibson's hard drive software SpinRite. He developed it himself 20 years ago. grc.com is the site. If you have a RAID array you'll have to load each HD individually and run it outside of the array.
